title: Alien Comics Collection
description:
That is the first time I publish a torrent. Hope it will help.

Great fan of quality comics, I have found with torrents a way to read some that are non longer available. And started to think that it would be great to give others some of what I took. Starting with my great teenager enjoyment, "Aliens".

Well, definitely a huge collection of comics. I had them mostly from the "Alien Versus Predator" torrent, announced on piratebay:
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4243588/Alien_Vs_Predator

I published this one for those that, like me, do not want the various duels that were within. On THIS torrent, you will NOT have neither "Batman Vs Alien", "Superman Vs Alien", nor any other.

I will later publish a special "Alien Vs Predator", and only predator.

Why? Let's say that I didn't like them (Not the AVP comics, but all these unlikely duels involving most of the USA superheroes, Predator is just uglygly great), and that I had to put a limit to my selection.

The only benefit of this torrent is for those that want only the alien stories, and these will appreciate it to be significantly lighter (1 Gb "only", when the AVP weighs 2.5). I do not intend this one to be specially popular, and will seed it accordingly.

All comment will be appreciated.

Enjoy.
